name: Mount Ookie
description:
Please rate us in Ludum Dare site!

Once in a thousand years, the ancient Mount Ookie wakes from its slumber, and makes its journey to safety under the world tree.

But alas! A deadly swarm of mountain wasps tries to drain the Ookie from its life force.
Protect the Ookie! Keep it alive!

This is a short survival plaftormer made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 46. Theme: *Keep It Alive*

Instructions

- Arrow keys (or WASD) to move, UP (or W) to jump, Space to pick up/throw wasps.
- Throw wasps at each other to kill both
- Feed wasps to Ookie to replenish its life
- Throw wasps at hedge to clear the way.

Credits

Art by Stav Goldstein and Yakier Bunker
Programming by Ori Brusilovsky
Music and Sfx by Alon Kaplan
Font: Compass by somepx

Built with Godot Game Engine.
